title: Online Workshop for Developing Entrepreneurial Thinking for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science teaching methods and digital tool utilization experience
context.additional_context: A 5-day collaborative project-based learning program conducted in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three entrepreneurial thinking frameworks to solving science education problems
Learners can propose creative solutions to social-emotional challenges in post-COVID-19 educational settings through online collaboration with peers
Learners can design and present viable social entrepreneurship projects in science education using smartphone-based tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
